hints.content:
Planet Punky has $\tealE{14}$ green aliens and $\maroonD{61}$ red aliens.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/24ebfb22f083235688e243a350cc7741ba76b7a0)

$\tealE{14} + \maroonD{61} = \goldE{75}$

Planet Plunky also had $\blueE{25}$ blue aliens.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/919d3116b79cc910bf55a491dbf7e0c270aa218b)

$\goldE{75} + \blueE{25} = \purpleD{100}$

There were $\purpleD{100}$ total aliens on Planet Plunky.

question.content:
Planet Punky has $14$ green aliens, $61$ red aliens, and $25$ blue aliens.  

**How many total aliens are on Planet Punky?**  

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] aliens
